description:
Python, Data Science and the Community: The Past, Present and Future -
PyCon Italia 2022

We’ll talk about some of the history of Python, Data Science and our
community, the current state of affairs, and what is waiting for us in
the future. And yes(!), we’ll also be talking about and having fun with
PyScript.

Speaker: Fabio Pliger
title: Python, Data Science and the Community: The Past, Present and Future
